room_title: Escape room "Walkers" by Great Escape Delaware in Newark
review: We had a great time in the "Walkers" room! Party of 6 and we did pretty good. Escaped with only 55 seconds left. Good work by our team and some helpful clues from the man behind the computer screen. Very cool experience.

room_title: Escape room "Walkers" by Great Escape Delaware in Newark
review: Had a great time! The staff was excellent and knew exactly when to help us out with a little hint. Kids a blast. We did The Walkers room tonight but will definitely go back to do another.

room_title: Escape room "Walkers" by Great Escape Delaware in Newark
review: We had a great time in the Walkers room! The safety video was funny, and the staff was friendly and helpful. The theming was impressive and the puzzles were varied and creative. We will definitely come back for new challenges!

room_title: Escape room "Walkers" by Great Escape Delaware in Newark
review: Tried the Zombies room and it was an extremely fun challenge. Definitely go check out the escape rooms here! Shout out to Jill who was the clue giver to our room for making it a fantastic experience!

room_title: Escape room "Walkers" by Great Escape Delaware in Newark
review: Absolutely loved the Walkers Room! We had so much fun, and even the hints made us laugh and cry at the same time! This was the best hr locked in a room with others ever!! The customer service was excellent and the room was super hard but soooo much fun!!! I will definitely be back for another room!!!
